text: Piante da frutto (fico, caco, pomacee e drupacee)

SELECT text_to_show  FROM (
    SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q3.A1' THEN 'Siepe/bordura drupe precoci (Prunus)'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q3.A2' THEN 'Siepe/bordura drupe tardive (Ligustrum)'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q3.A3' THEN 'Siepe/bordura bacche (Cornus, Rhamnus frangula, Viburnum)'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q3.A4' THEN 'Siepe/bordura samare e disamare (Acer, Fraxinus, Ailanthus)'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q3.A5' THEN 'Siepe/bordura pomacee (Pyracantha, Crataegus, Cotoneaster)'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q3.A6' THEN 'Siepe/bordura gelso (Morus)'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q3.A7' THEN 'Siepe/bordura edera'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q3.A8' THEN 'Siepe/bordura nocciolo'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q3.A9' THEN 'Altra siepe o bordura'

        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q5.A1' THEN 'Giardino/boschetto sempreverdi'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q5.A2' THEN 'Giardino/boschetto Fagacee, Ulmacee, Malvales (quercia, olmo, tiglio)'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q5.A3' THEN 'Giardino/boschetto Salicacee (pioppo e salice)'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q5.A4' THEN 'Giardino/boschetto piante da frutto (fico, caco, pomacee e drupacee)'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q5.A5' THEN 'Giardino/boschetto Catalpa o Paulownia'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q5.A6' THEN 'Altro giardino o boschetto'

        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q7.A1' THEN 'Fabbricato/i ad uso agricolo'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q9.A1' THEN 'Fabbricato/i ad uso abitativo'

        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q11.A1' THEN 'Coltura estensiva soia'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q11.A2' THEN 'Coltura estensiva leguminose'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q11.A3' THEN 'Coltura estensiva mais'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q11.A4' THEN 'Coltura estensiva cereali autunno-vernini'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q11.A5' THEN 'Coltura estensiva pomodoro'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q11.A6' THEN 'Coltura estensiva colza'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q11.A7' THEN 'Coltura estensiva orticole'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q11.A8' THEN 'Altra coltura estensiva'

        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A1' THEN 'Coltura arborea melo'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A2' THEN 'Coltura arborea pero'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A3' THEN 'Coltura arborea pesco e nettarino'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A4' THEN 'Coltura arborea albicocco'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A5' THEN 'Coltura arborea susino'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A6' THEN 'Coltura arborea ciliegio'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A7' THEN 'Coltura arborea vite'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A8' THEN 'Coltura arborea actinidia'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A9' THEN 'Coltura arborea caco'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A10' THEN 'Coltura arborea noce'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A11' THEN 'Coltura arborea pioppo'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A12' THEN 'Coltura arborea Paulownia'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q13.A13' THEN 'Altra coltura arborea'

        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q15.A1' THEN 'Argine fiume'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q15.A2' THEN 'Argine canale'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q15.A3' THEN 'Fosso o scolina'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q15.A4' THEN 'Laghetto e bacino irriguo'
        WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INSTNEW.Q15.A5' THEN 'Altro argine o canale'

        ELSE ''
    END AS text_to_show
    FROM task_on_geo_object AS togo
    JOIN task AS t on togo.task_id = t.task_id
    JOIN given_answer AS ga ON togo.togo_id = ga.togo_id
    JOIN answer AS ans ON ans.answer_id = ga.answer_id
    JOIN question AS q ON q.question_id = ans.question_id
    WHERE togo.gid = $gid AND
    t.task_id = 5) AS sq2
WHERE text_to_show != ''

SELECT ga.text as text_to_show
FROM task_on_geo_object AS togo
JOIN given_answer as ga ON togo.togo_id = ga.togo_id
WHERE togo.task_id = 8 AND togo.gid = $gid AND ga.answer_id='BMSB.SCENNEW.Q3.A1'
Piante da frutto (fico, caco, pomacee e drupacee)

SELECT togo_id, answer_id, text_to_show FROM ( SELECT togo.togo_id, answer_id, CASE WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INST.Q1.A1' THEN 'Siepi e bordure' WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INST.Q3.A1' THEN 'Giardini e boschetti' WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INST.Q5.A1' THEN 'Fabbricati ad uso agricolo' WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INST.Q7.A1' THEN 'Fabbricati ad uso abitativo' WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INST.Q9.A1' THEN 'Colture estensive' WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INST.Q11.A1' THEN 'Colture arboree' WHEN ga.answer_id = 'BMSB.INST.Q13.A1' THEN 'Argini e canali' ELSE '' END AS text_to_show FROM task_on_geo_object AS togo JOIN task AS t on togo.task_id = t.task_id JOIN given_answer AS ga ON togo.togo_id = ga.togo_id WHERE togo.gid = $1 AND t.task_id = $2 ) AS sq2 WHERE text_to_show != ''
